name: Dragon Spear
description: Enjoy some cool blows and fascinating action moves! Hunting down powerful raid bosses with friends is also a must.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, 10 Processor: 1.6 Ghz CPU or higher Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD4000, AMD HD 6550D (or higher) DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, 10 Processor: 2.0 Ghz CPU or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 650, AMD HD7850 (or higher) DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 5 GB available space
